definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Leptons , the best known of which is the electron, are immune to the strong force.
sentences.chinese: 輕子中最著名的是電子，這類粒子不會感受到強力。

sentences.english: The lepton number is generalized to the lepton charge.
sentences.chinese: 我們把輕子數推廣爲輕子荷。

sentences.english: Leptonic probes do not suffer from this handicap .
sentences.chinese: 輕子探針不會遇到這一困難。

sentences.english: The abnormal mass and the magnetic moment of three generation leptons have been calculated.
sentences.chinese: 據此計算了三代輕子的“反常質量”與“反常磁矩”。

sentences.english: The different kinds of quarks or leptons are known technically as flavors .
sentences.chinese: 夸克和輕子的這些個同種類，從技術上看是有特色的。
